byline: Shannon Mullen, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Noel King, Karen Casey, David Brancaccio, Sam Beard, Sabri Ben-Achour, Stephan Richter, D Gorenstein, Bruce Johnson, Johnny Niemann, Jeremy Hobson and Katie Long
teaser: Today the National Rifle Association releases its proposal for placing armed guards in all public schools. The unemployment rate in the 17 countries that use the euro has hit a new high -- 12 percent.  And as New York City Michael Bloomberg serves his final year in office, we take a look at whether his personal wealth has protected him from political interest groups.
